channel.title: Comments on: Kelly’s One Year Off… and counting
channel.description: A Year Off With Our Kids

item.title: By: Helen
item.dc:creator: Helen
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://projectpinkday.com/portfolio/kellys-one-year-off-and-counting/comment-page-1/#comment-167">Tom</a>.
Can't believe it's been a year. So happy for all of you. (Disliked goldfinch tho!)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tom.

Can’t believe it’s been a year. So happy for all of you. (Disliked goldfinch tho!)

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Tom
item.dc:creator: Tom
item.description: Kelly I get tears in my eyes just reading this. I'm not sure why, but I think it has something to do with Alison. I'm going to try in read the books you mentioned. God bless you and stay balanced.
item.content:encoded:
Kelly I get tears in my eyes just reading this. I’m not sure why, but I think it has something to do with Alison. I’m going to try in read the books you mentioned. God bless you and stay balanced.

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Jamie Shelton
item.dc:creator: Jamie Shelton
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://projectpinkday.com/portfolio/kellys-one-year-off-and-counting/comment-page-1/#comment-163">Lynda Beam</a>.
You are one amazing lady, my friend. This was wonderful to read. For so many reasons I wish you continued success. Everything about you is inspirational! Keep blogging. I look forward to reading more.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lynda Beam.

You are one amazing lady, my friend. This was wonderful to read. For so many reasons I wish you continued success. Everything about you is inspirational! Keep blogging. I look forward to reading more.

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Lynda Beam
item.dc:creator: Lynda Beam
item.description: miss you guys so much, but I hope you find something so you can be where you love to be...
item.content:encoded:
miss you guys so much, but I hope you find something so you can be where you love to be…

LikeLiked by 1 person
